tagline: Card games with live DJ's every Thursday & Friday
rules:
Welcome to the Card Game Conisseurs SMASHED instance

OUR CODE OF CONDUCT

1. New joiners are not to block or mute any official SMASHED staff members or our own.

2. 18+ Only.

3. Follow VRChat's TOS.

4. No discrimination, bullying or unnecessary drama.

5. Be civil, act your age.

6. No portals to any other club worlds.

7. Pace yourself. Don't drink until you drop!

8. Suspicious activity will not be tolerated.

9. Upper torsos may be exposed. Viewer discretion is advised.

Like what we do? Join the Discord!

https://discord.gg/NCEx9Baa9z
infoBoard:
In the beginning of 2026 Muffin asked the owner of The Dealers Guild to run events officially in SMASHED and to grow the community so lobbies would be full daily. We worked hard, every day and made a public group called Card Game Connisseurs to accomodate the influx of interested patrons.


-


Today SMASHED owes its after-hours success to these operations as the crowd that filtered in after 11pm EST has been brought in from the groups influence.


-


Card Game Connisseurs continues to operate loyally within SMASHED, only operating outside to futher the Connisseurs reach on the VRChat community.
